A Wilmington Walgreens will close this fall, one of more than a thousand locations slated to close nationwide over the next three years.
Walgreens plans to close around 1,200 stores across the Unite… [+4274 chars]

articles.author: Wes Venteicher
articles.title: Phillips 66 to close California refinery days after Newsom signed oil law - POLITICO
articles.description: The facility supplies about 8 percent of California’s gasoline.
articles.content: Newsom on Monday signed legislation aimed at preventing gasoline price spikes by giving the state authority to require refiners to store more gas and share resupply and maintenance plans with the sta… [+2943 chars]
